controller
Class TrackController

java.lang.Object
  controller.TrackController

public class TrackController
extends java.lang.Object

The TrackController class handles everything at the track.

The singleton loader

createTrack

public void createTrack()
This method checks if its necessary to create the track itself. If so, this method calls its private version to create a track.

getEmptyStation

public int getEmptyStation()
with this getter you can find the first empty station on the track to place the train on initialisation of the track. This prevents more trains on a single station.

Returns:
- [int i] the ID-number of the empty station
